title: Great British Food Festival at Margam Park

dates.note: Usually a weekend in July or August

description: The Great British Food Festival brings a celebration of artisan food and drink to the magnificent setting of Margam Country Park in South Wales. This family-friendly festival showcases a fantastic variety of independent traders, producers, and street food vendors from across Britain. Visitors can browse stalls laden with cheeses, chutneys, cakes, craft beers, and locally produced treats, while live cooking demonstrations inspire culinary adventures. Set within the beautiful 850-acre park with its Grade I listed Orangery, ruined abbey, and herd of deer, the festival combines gourmet delights with outdoor exploration. Dogs are welcome, and car parking is included in the ticket price - perfect for a foodie family day out.
